verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: would] probably commit perjury if he spoke to special counsel Robert Mueller , according to former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARGM-ADV: probably] [V: commit] [ARG1: perjury] [ARGM-ADV: if he spoke to special counsel Robert Mueller] , [ARGM-ADV: according to former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie] .
President Donald Trump would probably commit perjury if [ARG0: he] [V: spoke] [ARG2: to special counsel Robert Mueller] , according to former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie .
President Donald Trump would probably commit perjury if he spoke to special counsel Robert Mueller , [V: according] to former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie .
